name: TWISTER I-8 SIMULACRUM. in motion.
description:
TWISTER I-8 Simulacrum.

Sometimes we recognise ourselves in others. But all those patterns are no more than a dance of shadows in Plato's cave. Light dissolves them. Illusions are real and reality is an illusion. And as every simulacrum, it contains nothing but emptiness.


.
TWISTERS is a project about inconstant and changeable human nature and about different ways people may react to something that doesn't fit their expectations. Based on a wordplay when the word "twist" can have several meanings.
.

Original animation 2000x2000 px, 30 fps. 
Initially minted in edition of 10 copies.
TWISTERS is the original series of abstract animated artworks by Olga Feldman.

Dedicated to those who keeps silence.
